name: Good Night Peregrine
description:
A short visual novel completely made by https://twitter.com/EmeraldKitty_

Spend time with Perry, a shut-in sarcastic gamer,  and his eccentric and colorful friends in this short experimental visual novel! Perhaps you may uncover some secrets from the past too ;P

This was my first time making a game all by myself, so take it as you will with that in mind
